content:
Just now I've made several changes to the puzzle:

* Test 8 and Validator 8 are the same as Test 6 and Validator 6 (see screenshot below), so I've removed the duplicate cases.

https://imgur.com/a/tXpncHr

* I've corrected the typo in the Input to Test 6 ("Pointless"): mundande => mundane.

* I've moved the last constraint to Goal section. ("All words are considered synonyms with all words in the same thesaurus group (one input-line) and with no other words.")

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: It works for me

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: It works for me too

output the 2 kangaroo ... => Output the 2 kangaroo ... (to keep the flow and better distinguish comments from output)

In the example besides marking the kangaroo words bold, maybe also mark the joey words italic?

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: It works for me, and I don't remember seeing another similar puzzle.

Goal
* Paragraph 2: Suggest to format "joey word" in <<bold>>.

* Paragraph 2: Suggest to delete "the free encyclopedia".

* Paragraph 3: Please fix the typo: "ouput" => "output".

* Paragraph 3: Please change "Kangaroo" to "kangaroo".

* Paragraph 3: Please add "{{: }} and" after "followed by".

* Paragraph 3: Please fix the typo: "seperated" => "separated".

* Paragraph 3: Please change "comma" to "a comma and a space".

* Paragraph 3: Please fix the typo: "alphabetcial" => "alphabetical".

* Paragraph 3: Please fix the typo: "thesarus" => "thesaurus".

* Paragraph 3: Please format "NONE" as a {{constant}}.

* Example: Please fix the typo: "thesarus" => "thesaurus".

* Near the end: Please format ": " and ", " as {{constants}} (take care to exclude the quotation marks from the formatting).

* Near the end: Please fix the typo: "seperated" => "separated".

Input
* Please fix the typo: "seperated" => "separated".

* Please format ", " as a {{constant}} (take care to exclude the quotation marks from the formatting).

Output
* Please format ":", "," and "NONE" as {{constants}}.

* Please change "Kangaroo" to "kangaroo".

Constraints
* Please fix the typo: "thesarus" => "thesaurus".

Thanks.

Thanks a bunch!
All great points!
Italic format is not available in the statement.

Thank you too! Missing two last time:

Input
* Please fix the typo: "seperated" => "separated".

Output
* Please change "Kangaroo" to "kangaroo".

Input
* Line 1: Please fix the typo: "synonomous" => "synonymous".

Goal
* Based on the comment on the forum:
https://forum.codingame.com/t/community-puzzle-kangaroo-words-puzzle-discussion/203763/7

I would suggest to revise the middle part as follows:

The program must first identify all the kangaroo words and all their joey words for every input-line of synonyms, and then output them in alphabetical order of the kangaroo words, one line per kangaroo word. If there are multiple joey words for a kangaroo word, the joeys should be output in alphabetical order too.
The program must output {{NONE}} instead if none of the lines in the given thesaurus contains kangaroo words.

Thanks.

I've made the revisions mentioned above.

For reference, this is the original version:

The program must output all kangaroo words contained in the given thesaurus followed by {{: }} and their corresponding joey words, separated by comma and a space. The output should be in alphabetical order.
If no words in the given thesaurus are kangaroo words the program should output {{NONE}} instead.
I've further revised the statement as described here: https://forum.codingame.com/t/community-puzzle-kangaroo-words-puzzle-discussion/203763/21
